headline: AppLovin upgraded on platform growth and ‘unlimited TAM’
summary: Investing.com -- RBC Capital Markets initiated coverage of AppLovin with an Outperform rating and $700 price target, given company’s platform positioning in performance advertising and marketing technology.

headline: APP Stock Skyrockets 140% in 6 Months: Should You Board the Train?
summary: AppLovin's 140% surge in six months is powered by Axon 2's AI-driven ad boom, soaring profits and bullish growth forecasts.
